text: Feldon is a network infrastructure and
Data Solutions provider over the last
120 years we've been helping our
customers with their Communications and
connectivity requirements more recently
we've evolved to help our customers with
their business outcomes by making the
most out of their data common challenges
that we see on the networking side
include bandwidth availability converg
it OT wired and wireless networks
resilience and security common
challenges on the data side are more
around interoperability and integration
for example managing information based
on different
protocols integrating Legacy equipment
making data available to build custom
applications and providing context for
data that comes from different sylos we
are showcasing our enhanced Network and
data capabilities that are delivered
through our Beldon Horizon platform our
Beldon Horizon platform is a single pane
of glass to manage Network
infrastructure deliver insights and
enable digital Transformations Feldon
Horizon is engineered to easily
integrate with a WS iot sitewise to
enable transferring data from the OT
side to the AWS Cloud so using beldin
offerings and AWS for storage to compute
we're able to leverage AWS Ai and ml
services customer I want to tell you
about is our own Richmond Indiana
facility it's a 100y old cable
manufacturing plant that manages 15,000
SKS and it had a 7% scrap rate and
frequent change over that was causing 25
hours of lost time per machine per week
we installed an itot converge Network
and transformed the data to enable
dashboards and visualizations this
implementation led to an 8% increase in
oee and over 500,000 in increased
performance annually I'm excited about
our partnership with AWS because
together we can help customers unlock
the full potential to their data Beldon
helps on the OT side and with AWS we can
turn raw data into insights and simplify
the it complexities of digital
transformation
